divs: Sighting DetailsOn the 17th of July 2008 I was on the front porch and seen an object mooving from the moon to the east then disapeared I though it was a star covered by clouds. on the night of the 18 July 2008 my wife was outside and told me to get the camera and come to her i went to the front porch and took pictures of the object mooving past the moon. It was mooving at a good speed then stoped then mooved again at the same speed. after 2mins it disapered. I could not make out a shape of the object it was a bright light ive seen a lot of craft in the ski i spent 26 years in the military and am a trained observer, I know it was not a star or the space station or plane that we have at preasent. I have noticed that a lot of "ufo" activity in the past 3 years. We have seen cigar and triangle types moving over in the day time, maby this is all part of it.
trends: There have been no other sightings in West Elizabeth
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: seen a light in the sky mooving thoward the moon and then past it thenit vanashed
